io.spine.query

Interface Query<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of record identifiers
    R - the type of records
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityQuery, RecordQuery

    public interface Query<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    An query to fetch the records defined as Protobuf messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      @Nullable java.lang.Integer limit()
      Tells the maximum number of records to be returned as a query result.
      com.google.protobuf.FieldMask mask()
      Returns the field mask to be applied to each of the resulting records.
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<SortBy<?,R>> sorting()
      Returns the sorting directives to be applied to the query results.
      Subject<I,R> subject()
      Returns the subject of querying.

    • Method Detail

      • subject

        Subject<I,R> subject()
        Returns the subject of querying.

      • sorting

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<SortBy<?,R>> sorting()
        Returns the sorting directives to be applied to the query results.

        In case there are several fields to sort by, the directives are applied one by one starting from the first.

      • limit

        @Nullable java.lang.Integer limit()
        Tells the maximum number of records to be returned as a query result.

        If the limit is set, there must be at least one sorting directive specified.

        If the limit is not set, returns null.

      • mask

        com.google.protobuf.FieldMask mask()
        Returns the field mask to be applied to each of the resulting records.

        If the mask is not set, returns a default instance of the FieldMask.
